greeting: Welcome Chef! A world of cosmic culinary adventure awaits!
gameIntro:
Hello Culinary Cosmonauts!
Welcome aboard the International Chef Station, where we have one goal:
To train under the Head Chef, and hone the foraging skills needed to be a skilled gatherer of ingredients.
At the start of the game, you will be in your living quarters (be sure to put your uniform on)!
Head straight to the kitchen to get your recipe assignment from the chef.
From there you should check every room and crevice, and talk to everyone you meet to find those ingredients/valuable things to trade.
Finally: The Discovery Pod is the gateway to discovering neighboring planets!
Beware of monsters, but interacting with them might yield something interesting.
That's all for now, Chef! Good luck out there!
newGameMessage: Would you like to start a new game? Yes or no
confirmQuitMessage: Are you sure you want to quit this game? Yes or No
goodbyeMessage: We really don't want to say Goodbye to you
helpMessage:
*************************************************************************** HELP ****************************************************************************
		Direction options: North, South, West, East, Up & Down
		go <Direction>: Moves character in selected direction
		get <Item Name>: Adds item in the current location to Player's Inventory
		look <Item/Location/Character/Monster Name>/Inventory: Investigates Item, Location, Character or Monster, or displays player's inventory
		equip <Item Name>: item disappears from your inventory and is set as the player's equipped item
		drop <Item Name>: item is dropped onto the floor of the current location
		talk <Character Name>/<Monster Name>: Starts conversation with Character
		fly Discovery Pod: Requires key, GPS and equipped spacesuit in Discovery Pod. Allows user to fly to other planets.
		toggle music: Allows player to toggle music on/off.
		volume up/down: Allows player to adjust music volume.
		help: Displays a list of valid commands
		quit: prompts user if they would like to end the game
promptActionMessage: What would you like to do? Enter 'help' for valid actions.
missingWordMessage: Looks like you forgot a word! Please try again.
invalidActionMessage: You can't do that! Try again.
